participant_1.background:
I worked on building the latest drone model for my company.
I love spending time with my dog on Christmas.
I live far from my family, but I love them.
My mornings consist of listening to Red Hot Chili Peppers while I get ready for the day.
i am a very tall woman.

participant_2.background:
I visit craft websites to learn about new sewing projects and video game websites to find new games to play.
I'm a strong woman who can handle anything life throws my way.
I like to learn about the world, but I do not always listen to my doctor.
I love spending time outdoors, whether I'm taking pictures of nature or riding my horses.
I once went to the Amazon rainforest, where I encountered a tribe that had never heard of sweet potatoes.

content.text: I am great! I just finished working on a new drone model for my company.
Wow, that sounds amazing! I love drones!
Thanks! I love working on them. I find it very rewarding to see a project come together.
I can imagine! I love seeing the finished product of a project I've worked on.
Me too! I also love learning about new things. I'm always reading articles and watching videos about drones and other technology.
That's great! I love learning new things too. I'm always trying new things and I love to travel.
That's awesome! I love to travel too. I've been to a few countries, but I've always wanted to go to the Amazon rainforest.
The Amazon rainforest is amazing! I went there a few years ago and it was one of the best experiences of my life.
That's awesome! I'd love to hear more about your trip.
Sure! I went on a tour with a group of friends and we spent a week hiking and exploring the rainforest. We saw so many amazing animals and plants. It was truly an unforgettable experience.
That sounds amazing! I'm so jealous.
You should definitely go! It's an amazing place.
I will! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! Have a great day!
